data.description:
Step into a new era of virtual meetings with our app designed exclusively for Meta Quest! This versatile platform offers a unique blend of productivity and entertainment, making it the perfect space for both professional and social interactions.

Key Features
1. Meeting Rooms:

Host & Join: Easily create or join meeting rooms with just a few clicks. Whether you're hosting a team meeting, a casual hangout, or a public event, our app provides a seamless experience.
Private & Public Rooms: Choose the privacy level of your room. Keep it private for confidential discussions or make it public to allow anyone to join and participate.
Customizable Environment: Set the tone for your meeting by enabling or disabling the Fun Area, tailoring the room to fit the occasion.
2. Fun Area:
Take a break from the serious stuff and dive into our Fun Area. Engage in a variety of interactive activities that are sure to entertain and bring out the competitive spirit in everyone:

Basketball: Shoot some hoops and see who can score the most points.
Sword Fighting: Challenge friends to a duel and show off your skills.
Chess: Test your strategic thinking in classic chess matches.
Darts: Aim for the bullseye and perfect your throwing accuracy.
3. Whiteboard:
Enhance your discussions with our interactive whiteboard feature. Whether you're brainstorming ideas, explaining complex concepts, or just doodling, the whiteboard offers a versatile space for all your visual needs.
